name: Fried potatoe with meat and mushrooms
description: Cast iron skillet fried potatoe with pork and champignons. The potatoe comes with pickle.

name: Chicken with vegetables
description: Pieces of chicken fillet fried with string beans, bell pepper, french fries in a spicy sweet and sour sauce.Â

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Bacon and champignons, cream, Parmesan cheese, cherry, spices.

name: Spare ribs with potato wedges
description: Spare ribs are the extremely tender meat. Served with potatoe wedges.

name: Bibimbap
description: Popular korean dish: pork, bell pepper, carrot,  squash, mushrooms,  fern, kimchi, rice, egg, Gochujang pasta. Served with btoth and rice.

name: Dumplings with potatoe and onion
description: Russian vareniki with potato and onion.

name: Dumplings with potatoe, onion and mushrooms
description: Russian vareniki with potato, fried onion and mushrooms.

name: Wok Savoury tomato
description: Udon noodles, bell pepper, garlic scapes, carrot, onion, shiitake mushrooms, meat of your choice,  tomato sauce, teriyaki sauce,  Sriracha sauce, cherry.

name: Wok Creamy teriyaki
description: Udon noodles, bell pepper, garlic scapes, carrot, onion, shiitake mushrooms, meat of your choice, soya sauce,  teriyaki sauce, cream, spices.

name: Wok Tom Yum
description: Udon noodles, bell pepper, carrot, onion, shiitake mushrooms, mussel on the sash, tiger prawns,  squid, scallop, teriyaki sauce, tom yum pasta, cream, coconut milk,  cilantro, cherry.

name: Wok Japchae, not spicy
description: Sweet potatoe noodles (cellophane), bell pepper, garlic scapes, carrot, onion, shiitake mushrooms, meat of your choice, yoster sauce, teriyaki sauce, sesame seed oil, cilantro, spices, egg strips.

name: Ramen with pork
description: Ramen noodles, minced pork, egg, spring onion, yellow onion, roasted sesame seeds, gochukaru pepper, Toenjang pasta.

name: Galbi ribs
description: Spare ribs with vegetables and rice in Galbi sauce.

name: Samgyeopsal
description: Samgyeopsal - fried pork neck slices. It's a savoury dish served with korean salads: kimchi, garlic scapes, carrot, fern, cucumbers, lobo, garlic, green capsicum, sesame seed oil with salt and black pepper,  paste for meat, lettuce, 2 portions of boiled rice. This dish is for two people.
